item.title: A Decade of Backbone Evolution of the Brazilian Academic Network: observations from the perspective of the routers
Torrentu
item.description:
Project: GT-UNIT: Observing the BitTorrent Universe Through Telescopes, funded by RNP (2010–2013).

Goal: development of a monitoring architecture to allow the observation of BitTorrent networks seeking to pinpoint sharing of illegal files (e.g. child pornography) and copyrighted content.

Nowadays, the service is in use by the Incident Response and Security Team at the Brazilian Academic backbone network (RNP).
